input.sentences: i never ran a race before .
but i trained hard for this .
i ran long and i ran hard .
and i got to see the top of the world .
output.sentences: The long plunge of the mountain side looked daunting.
But the race must go on for the runners.
And down the hill they trained hard.
Running up the hill was extremely hard.
The view view at the end of the race was like being at the top of the world.
